hero.title: PolarDrive is the first fiscal tool based on hourly data collected via the Vehicle Fleet API. It automates, archives, and certifies the exclusive business use of your company car.
hero.subtitle: Traceable innovation.
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At DataPolar, we believe every company should have access to clear, traceable, and automated fiscal tools. We aim to simplify what is complicated.
mission.paragraph2: PolarDrive was born from a real need: proving the business use of a car with objective data. No borderline strategies — just transparency, security, and automation.
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let’s discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.
contact.label.name: Name
contact.placeholder.name: Your name
contact.error.send: Error sending the message. Please try again.
contact.error.required: Please fill out the required fields.
products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Tech solutions for future-oriented companies.
products.polardrive.description: Certify the business use of your Vehicle. 100% deductible. 100% defensible.
polardrive.title: PolarDrive
polardrive.subtitle: The ultimate solution for 100% tax deductibility of your business Vehicle.
polardrive.benefits.title: Tax Benefits
polardrive.benefits.item2: No fiscal risk or ambiguous interpretations
polardrive.features.title: Technical Features
polardrive.features.item1: Hourly data collection via Vehicle Fleet API
polardrive.features.item3: Local AI component for visual summaries
polardrive.CTA: Find out how to activate PolarDrive

admin.mainWorkflow.alerts.zipPdfReportsN: It is not possible to download the .zip file because no PDF Report has been generated yet
admin.mainWorkflow.alerts.urlGenerationC: Vehicle authorization URL copied to clipboard. Send it to the client (CTRL+V)
admin.mainWorkflow.alerts.urlGenerationF: Error while generating the authorization URL
Are you sure you want to change this vehicle's status to NotActive? Please ensure that the signed consents, from the specific company, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to proceed

Vehicle status has been verified as NotActive and NotFetching. Restoring the status to Active will also re-enable Fetching (data acquisition). Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to proceed
It is not allowed to set a Vehicle to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) while it is in Active status

Vehicle status has been verified as NotActive. Do you authorize changing the status to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) for this Vehicle? Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to proceed

Vehicle status has been verified as NotFetching. Are you sure you want to change the status to Fetching (enable data acquisition)?  Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to proceed
